thread.title: Dell-EMC Merger Plan Is Huge, but Questions Remain as Dust Settles
thread.title_full: Dell-EMC Merger Plan Is Huge, but Questions Remain as Dust Settles

author: Hill, Steven
title: Dell-EMC Merger Plan Is Huge, but Questions Remain as Dust Settles
text: October 14, 2015 Rate this report Intelligence Report Dell’s historic bid to purchase EMC’s federation for $67 billion and take it private will give EMC breathing room, but it remains to be seen if Dell will be a better shepherd for EMC’s future than the private equity critters currently plaguing it.
